Container.Name: Snapsmaps
Container.Overview:
Your own self-hostable social media application. Easily share photos with a map pin to friends and family.
-- Features • Fully optimized for mobile devices • Social media profile functionality • Basic notification system • Photo collections • User follow system • Comment functionality • Secure, email-verified account registration • NSFW submission tagging • Admin tooling • Limited guest access (no account required) • Seamless post and collection sharing with OpenGraph metadata integration
Container.DonateText: Only donate if you are able and find the app useful. Thanks!
Container.Requires:
• PostgreSQL database • Google Maps API Key • SMTP accessible email
You'll need a Google Maps API key with access to the Google Maps Javascript SDK: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key
An SMTP enabled email for user creation and verification emails

Config.Name: Content
Config.Description: This is where Snapsmaps will store user content

Config.Name: GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY
Config.Description:
You'll need to create a google maps api key that has access to the Google Maps Javascript SDK.
https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key

Config.Name: SECRET_KEY
Config.Description: Replace with any randomly generated string. This is used in user session creation. Changing it will invalidate any active sessions.

Config.Name: DOMAIN
Config.Description: The primary hosting domain. e.x https://mysnapsmapsdomain.com

Config.Name: ALLOWED_DOMAINS
Config.Description: Also known as cors domains. You do not need to add the DOMAIN set domain to this list.

Config.Name: ADMINS
Config.Description: Comma seperated list of account admins emails. Your account email should be listed.

Config.Name: SECURE_COOKIES
Config.Description: If set to true, the site must be access from https. Set to false if accessing from http. If accessing from http then log in sessions will not be created. tl;dr If you enable this, your users must access it from https in order to log in.

Config.Name: Max Photo Upload Size (MB)
Config.Description: The maximum allowed upload size for photos in megabytes

Config.Name: Manifest Start URL
Config.Description: The site manifest start_url. Generally this should be your domain. e.x https://mydomain.tld

Config.Name: Manifest Site name
Config.Description: Needed for the manifiest and for opengraph metadata.

Config.Name: Manifest ID
Config.Description: Put some randomly genearted string here that is unique

Config.Name: Manifest Site Description
Config.Default: Easily share photos with a map pin to friends and family.
Config.Description: Needed for the manifiest and for opengraph metadata.
